CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Tertiary General Hospital?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Tertiary General Hospital is arc {Mental Health Hospital}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Maternal and Child Health Center?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Maternal and Child Health Center is arc {Mental Health Hospital}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Tertiary General Hospital} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Mental Health Hospital} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Mental Health Hospital to Tertiary General Hospital in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Maternal and Child Health Center to Mental Health Hospital in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Maternal and Child Health Center and Tertiary General Hospital in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Maternal and Child Health Center and Tertiary General Hospital is {258}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Mental Health Hospital and Maternal and Child Health Center in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Mental Health Hospital and Maternal and Child Health Center is {282}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Tertiary General Hospital?
SC.A: The total flow output from Tertiary General Hospital is {906}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Tertiary General Hospital?
SC.A: The total flow input by Tertiary General Hospital is {606}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 528? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {648} from {Tertiary General Hospital} to {Mental Health Hospital}, a flow of {540} from {Maternal and Child Health Center} to {Mental Health Hospital}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 174? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {90} from {Maternal and Child Health Center} to {Tertiary General Hospital}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 270 and 528? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {516} from {Mental Health Hospital} to {Tertiary General Hospital}, a flow of {282} from {Mental Health Hospital} to {Maternal and Child Health Center}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Maternal and Child Health Center to Tertiary General Hospital or from Mental Health Hospital to Tertiary General Hospital?
NC.A: The flow from {Mental Health Hospital} to {Tertiary General Hospital} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Mental Health Hospital to Tertiary General Hospital, from Maternal and Child Health Center to Mental Health Hospital, or from Mental Health Hospital to Maternal and Child Health Center?
NC.A: The flow from {Maternal and Child Health Center} to {Mental Health Hospital} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Tertiary General Hospital}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Mental Health Hospital} and {Tertiary General Hospital}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Tertiary General Hospital, Arc Mental Health Hospital, Arc Maternal and Child Health Center}.
